description: These are the service requests created by 311, categorized by the channel on which they were submitted

metadata.description: These are the service requests created by 311, categorized by the channel on which they were submitted. 311 offers customers 4 channels to submit service requests: by calling 311, using the SF311 Mobile App, visiting our website, or messaging us through Twitter. This dataset is updated on a monthly basis.

name: 311 Cases by Channel
